survey_name: Online Learning Platform User Satisfaction Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from users of online learning platforms to understand their satisfaction levels, preferences, and areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How often do you use online learning platforms?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for better user experience.

script.question_text: How often do you use online learning platforms?

questions.question_text: Which online learning platforms have you used in the past 6 months? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections and provide an 'Other' option with a text field.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE with an open-text option for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which online learning platforms have you used in the past 6 months? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What is the primary reason you use online learning platforms?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button with an 'Other' option for detailed feedback.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE with an open-text option for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What is the primary reason you use online learning platforms?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the course variety available on the platforms you use?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for measuring satisfaction levels.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the course variety available on the platforms you use?

questions.question_text: What features do you value the most in an online learning platform? (Select up to 3)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections with a limit of 3 choices for clarity.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE with a selection limit of 3.

script.question_text: What features do you value the most in an online learning platform? (Select up to 3)

questions.question_text: How would you rate the user interface of the platforms you use?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for consistency.

script.question_text: How would you rate the user interface of the platforms you use?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for online learning platforms?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture detailed feedback.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for online learning platforms?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend the online learning platforms you use to others?
questions.client_notes: Use a Net Promoter Score (NPS) scale for measuring likelihood.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend the online learning platforms you use to others?

questions.question_text: Do you prefer self-paced courses or instructor-led courses?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for clear responses.

script.question_text: Do you prefer self-paced courses or instructor-led courses?

questions.question_text: What is the biggest challenge you face when using online learning platforms?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button with an 'Other' option for detailed feedback.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE with an open-text option for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What is the biggest challenge you face when using online learning platforms?
